title: Ep. 183 - It's Time To Excommunicate Pro-Abortion Catholics
description:
Today on the show, we’ll talk more about that awful abortion law in New York and I’ll explain why the arguments made to support that law could apply just as well to post birth abortion. Also, why hasn’t Andrew Cuomo been excommunicated? Finally, why the State of the Union Address is a disgrace and an embarrassment. Date: 01-24-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
